Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 92nd/Burley
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted WB: 92nd, Burly, 91st, Commercial and 92nd; EB 92nd, Commercial , 91st, Brandon and 92nd: due to, street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 92nd/Burley, due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

Westbound buses will operate via 92nd, Burley, 91st, Commercial and 92nd including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via 92nd, Commercial, 91st, Brandon and 92nd.

Allow extra travel time.
